properties.Desc:
Domaine de Cassiopée is a new estate in Maranges, specifically in Sampigny-les-Maranges, created by couple, Talloulah et Hugo Mathurin.

“Cassiopée was the first name we wanted to give our daughter, so when we bought the domaine before starting a family it naturally became our first born. In addition, we work with the stars and moon in biodynamie. Finally this opportunity to build this dream domaine in Burgundy at the age of 27 was a ‘bonne etoile’ in the sky - that’s Casiopée!” - Talloulah Dubourg

Brothers Marc and Alexandre Bachelet might be young but they are quick studies. They started Domaine Bachelet-Monnot in 2005 from a combination of family vineyards and long term leases. Their grandfather founded Domaine Bernard Bachelet et Fils in Chassagne-Montrachet and their father made the wines there.
